group_1.textLeft: I think we've stopped, too.
That's right.
It's just like what Touka and Nemu had said:
Looking back to the past won't move us@towards the future.
That's why everyone else had stopped,
but the world itself disappearing...
I think that's on us.
It's just my assumption.
But I think the future we'd envisioned was@too warm and happy,
to the point that neither of us wanted@to leave it.

group_1.textRight: I think we were perfectly happy and satisfied@with that future.
But like they said, you can't see the future@if you remain still.

group_1.textLeft: In doing nothing, the future will pass you by,@and you'll find yourself in total nothingness.
Time moves forward regardless of our will.

group_1.narration: "It's an immense, precious miracle@that we're alive to begin with."
―Iroha―@In order to create time to live...@In order to create a future for Magical Girls...
―Iroha―@We've all become one...@So we can't stop walking forward.
―Iroha―@If we choose to remain still,@time will stop for everyone.
―Ui―@We have to move forward@so we can bridge our way to the future.
―Iroha―@Yes, even if everyone else stops,@we have to keep forging the path ahead.
―Iroha―@So let's go, Ui, and userName too!@We have to move forward together!
―Ui―@Yeah, let's set the gears in motion for the future!

group_1.textLeft: *Yawn* Mm...@[chara:100104:lipSynch_0][wait:1][chara:100104:lipSynch_1][chara:100104:cheek_0][chara:100104:face_mtn_ex_010.exp3.json]Good morning, Ui.
Good morning to you, too, userName.
*Giggle*
So this is the world within our hearts.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it's okay to see the future we want@if it's like this.
I haven't seen Mom and Dad in forever!
They've spoiled me enough last night to last@for a whole year!

group_1.textLeft: They were so surprised to see you.

group_1.textRight: I mean, I was really sick before,
and they've been abroad for all this time,
so it makes sense they'd be like that.
Besides, they treated you, too, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, they gave me all the cooking supplies@that I wanted.
I'll be using them for our picnic today.

group_1.textRight: I can't wait to see everyone.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah. We'll all be having a picnic under@the Eternal Sakura.
